title: Friday Arktoons
author: VD
content_html:
THE SWORD OF GOD Episode 44: Against the Ruin of Souls

BOB Episode 109: Convoy

FRUG THE WANDERER OF THE WASTELAND Episode 1: Frug gets a tip

FLYING SPARKS Episode 57: Kill or Capture

CHATEAU GRIEF Episode 200: Patience

FRIDAY FISH FUNNIES Episode 5: Moo Cow Got Milk

First, congratulations to CHATEAU GRIEF for hitting 200 episodes! That’s an impressive landmark for such a young site. Second, Arktoons is pleased to announce the launch of a new comic, FRUG THE WANDERER OF THE WASTELAND. All I know about it is that it is a) post-apocalyptic and b) funny. Be sure to check it out!
